title: Study In Europe Download
text: From the developers of Study in Budapest find universities in over 4+ Countries, 15 + Universities 400+ coursesSo you are an international student with a dream to study abroad? Youve spent lots of time searching for the right university but there is little or no personalised information or travel assistance in one place? Heres the solution:Named as one of the Most Exciting Apps at Websumit Dublin 2015 amongst 30,000+ by Tigerpawnstories - 2015- Nairaland.com Top 10 Apps every student should have - 2016- The Vanguard Newspaper Studyinbudapest Woos students with a new digitalised way to apply for admission- Naij.com Apply for university admission and travel assistance without agents -2016- Featured on UTV Ireland - 2015Top Featured App on Dream FM, Magic FM- Innovative App on ITU world telecom expo 2015, Budapest- Potpourri Magazines Future of university admissionStudy in Europe fixes the hardest problem of international students with technology driven services.Eliminate long hours spent on search engines looking for university information, tuition fee and comparing best courses and go straight to apply for your university admission in minutes!You can also add travel and visa assistance with a tap of a button:- Airport Taxi (your 47kg luggage from the airport to your hostel)- Flight- Accommodation- Travel InsuranceWhat more can you do with the Study in Europe App?- Check the status of your application- Apply for Student Jobs- Help and support center filled with answers from international students like youStudy in AustriaStudy in GermanyStudy in PolandStudy in HungaryAnd thats not all,- Book visa appointment with a tap of a button to the embassy, no need for search- Find all the embassy and visa requirement in one app !Study in Europe is more than an App, and its yours.Using a single App! Join Thousands of students who turn their mobile phones into a school application form.
